item.title: Nearly 600 pounds of cocaine found hidden in banana shipment
item.description: Cocaine has been found hidden in banana shipments across the globe in recent months.

item.title: Defense lawyers for needy clients feel squeeze after federal funds dry up
item.description: A program that pays court-appointed private lawyers is facing a financial crisis, since it ran out of money in early July.
